quote_first: The bus left the station at
quote_last: - and she sat proud, like an accustomed traveller, apart from her father, John Henry, and Berenice. But after a while a serious doubt came in her, which even the answers of the bus-driver could not quite satisfy.
title: The Member of the Wedding
